item.title: Wall Street today: S&P 500, Nasdaq hit record high as jobs data bolsters hopes for Fed rate cut

bullets: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq rose to record high on Friday after the latest disappointing jobs data bolstered hopes that the US Federal
As of 10:10 AM Eastern Time, the S&P 500 added 0.1% to its all-time high and the Nasdaq Composite was 0.4% higher.

item.title: GST 2.0: A reform that touches every Indian

review.headline_rewrite: GST 2.0: A reform that touches every Indian
bullets: For farmers, reduced taxation on agricultural inputs eases costs, increases profitability, and strengthens the rural economy.
For the middle class, a simplified structure lowers day-to-day expenses, directly boosting purchasing power.
This is a historic milestone not just in tax reform but in governance itself, demonstrating how cooperative federalism—where the Union and States move together—can
